header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 28A*: Clause 28, page 16, line 15, leave out “the Isle of Wight” and insert “a county in which there are no districts”
61A*: Clause 69, page 41, line 25, at end insert—
text.IndentOne: “( ) that the use of particular premises has resulted, or (if the notice is not issued) is likely soon to result, in a sexual offence against a child,”

text.quote: 87A*: Clause 109, page 80, line 23, at end insert—
“(6A) A person commits an offence under the law of England and Wales if he or she—
text.IndentOne: (a) is the parent or guardian of a child, and
(b) gives consent for that child to enter into marriage before the age of 18 unless the written consent of both parties to the marriage has been obtained.
text.quote: (6B) The provisions of subsection (6A) also apply to any procedure undertaken to recognise a marriage contracted outside the United Kingdom.”
87B*: Clause 110, page 80, line 44, at end insert—
“(2A) A person commits an offence under the law of Scotland if he or she—
text.IndentOne: (a) is the parent or guardian of a child, and
(b) gives consent for that child to enter into marriage before the age of 18 unless the written consent of both parties to the marriage has been obtained.
text.quote: (2B) The provisions of subsection (2A) also apply to any procedure undertaken to recognise a marriage contracted outside the United Kingdom.”
94A*: Schedule 9, page 182, line 12, at end insert “or the driver of a vehicle”
94B*: Schedule 9, page 182, line 16, at end insert “or committed by a driver who fails to comply with the advance stop line regulations”
94C*: Schedule 9, page 182, line 20, at end insert “which shall not come into effect until 5 years after the relevant construction and use regulations have been brought into effect”
94D*: Schedule 9, page 182, line 32, at end insert—

“(2C) Before community support officers or police officers are authorised to enforce any of the offences listed in sub-paragraph (2B) relating to cyclists, they shall undertake a recognised cycle training course and provide evidence of this if requested.”
